author: amassiro
body:
Addition of DPGs github accounts with the "opt-in" option, as discussed at ORP meeting Tue 6th April.

List of DPGs is in here:
https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/PhysicsResultsConveners#Detector_Performance_Groups_DPG

In this PR the github names.

The list will be maintaned by the different DPGs.
title: Addition of DPGs
